name: Online Sequencer Sequence
summary: A SEQUENCE file is a song created by Online Sequencer, a web-based music sequencer. It contains a collection of sequenced musical notes. SEQUENCE files also contain song metadata , such as the song's time signature, instrument settings, grid spacing, and other data.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: SEQUENCE file open in Online Sequencer
